net.tridentsdk.plugin

Interface PluginLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginClassLoader

    @PossiblyThreadSafe
public interface PluginLoader
    Loads plugin classes
    Since:
    0.4-alpha
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<?> defineClass(String name, byte[] source)
      Creates a new Java class object for the class and the class source given
      void link(Class<?> c)
      Links all of the class dependencies
      Map<String,Class<?>> loadedClasses()
      Obtains the classes loaded by this plugin loader
      void putClass(Class<?> cls)
      Lists the class as loaded
      void unloadClasses()
      Unloads the classes that were loaded from this class loader

    • Method Detail

      • link

        void link(Class<?> c)
        Links all of the class dependencies
        Parameters:
        c - the class to link

      • defineClass

        Class<?> defineClass(String name,
                     byte[] source)
        Creates a new Java class object for the class and the class source given
        Parameters:
        name - the class name
        source - the class bytecode
        Returns:
        the class representing the bytes given

      • putClass

        void putClass(Class<?> cls)
        Lists the class as loaded
        Parameters:
        cls - the class to list

      • loadedClasses

        Map<String,Class<?>> loadedClasses()
        Obtains the classes loaded by this plugin loader
        Returns:
        the class mapped to the class name, class

      • unloadClasses

        void unloadClasses()
        Unloads the classes that were loaded from this class loader
